column4: Hi, I have a shell script I am writing to check the permissions of log & cache files - not done too many of these.
Am succesfully getting the permission value ...  perm=`stat -t --format=%a  $base/${proj[$j]}/trunk/kohana/application/cache`
Just struggling with the if clause ... if  [$perm == 755]
#bash might be more helpful for something more programming oriented like this.
